isis.stitle: CAB: 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 AND 8600 MODELS - REMOVE - HOOD SEAL

svcsubproc.title: Remove Hood Seal on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700 and 8500 Models, Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600 and 8500 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models
svcsubproc.para: The hood seal is pushed onto the hood seal flange of the cowl tray.

step1.para: Unlatch fiberglass tilt hood on both sides and raise hood to full open position.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 25 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Remove hood seal (Item 1) from cowl tray (Item 2) by pulling it off the hood seal flange of the cowl tray, starting at one end or the other. Save the hood seal for installation, if not damaged.

figure.caption: Figure 25. Hood Seal for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600 and 8500 Models

svcsubproc.title: Remove Hood Seal on Standard Cab and Extended Cab for 8600 Model

step1.para: Unlatch fiberglass tilt hood on both sides and raise hood to full open position.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 26 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Remove hood seal (Item 1) from cowl tray (Item 2) by pulling it off the hood seal flange of the cowl tray, starting at one end or the other. Save the hood seal for installation, if not damaged.
Remove short hood seal (Item 3) from cowl tray (Item 2) by pulling it off the hood seal flange of the cowl tray. Save the short hood seal for installation, if not damaged.
